article.title: Horner Assigned to Office of the Undersecretary of Defense for Acquisition, Technology and Logistics
article.text: Maj. Gen. John. P. Horner, USAF, has been assigned as director, Defense Department Special Access Program Central Office, and director, Special Programs, Office of the Undersecretary of Defense for Acquisition, Technology and Logistics, Office of the Secretary of Defense, Pentagon, Washington, D.C.
